mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM challenge JOIN member USING (mem_num)

SELECT c.*, m.mem_nick, md.mem_photo FROM challenge c JOIN member m ON c.mem_num = m.mem_num LEFT OUTER JOIN member_detail md ON c.mem_num = md.mem_num
WHERE c.chal_num = #{chal_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chal_join (chal_joi_num, chal_num, mem_num, dcate_num, chal_joi_status, chal_joi_date, chal_joi_ip) VALUES (chal_join_seq.nextval, #{chal_num}, #{mem_num}, #{dcate_num}, 0, SYSDATE, #{chal_joi_ip})
mapper.select:
SELECT cj.*, c.chal_title, c.chal_sdate, c.chal_edate, c.chal_fee, dc.dcate_charity FROM chal_join cj JOIN challenge c ON cj.chal_num = c.chal_num JOIN dona_category dc ON cj.dcate_num = dc.dcate_num WHERE cj.mem_num = #{mem_num}
AND c.chal_sdate > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND c.chal_sdate <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND c.chal_edate >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND c.chal_edate < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY cj.chal_joi_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chal_payment (chal_pay_num, chal_joi_num, mem_num, od_imp_uid, chal_pay_price, chal_point, chal_pay_date, chal_pay_status) VALUES (chal_payment_seq.nextval, #{chal_joi_num}, #{mem_num}, #{od_imp_uid}, #{chal_pay_price}, 0, SYSDATE, #{chal_pay_status})
